Smart Soap Dispenser with AI Technology: Create a soap dispenser that utilizes artificial intelligence to automatically detect when soap is running low and orders more from an accompanying app. The app can also provide personalized recommendations for soap usage based on the user's hand washing habits.

Interactive Soap Dispenser with Games: Design a soap dispenser that doubles as a fun and interactive experience for kids. The dispenser can have different games and animations on its screen, such as a "soap bubble" game where kids can blow bubbles and chase them around the sink.

Customizable Soap Dispenser with 3D Printing: Create a soap dispenser that allows users to customize its design and shape using 3D printing technology. Users can design their own unique dispenser using an accompanying app and have it printed and shipped to their doorstep.

Soap Dispenser with Air Purifying Technology: Develop a soap dispenser that incorporates air purifying technology to clean the air in the bathroom while the user washes their hands. The dispenser can use a HEPA filter or other air purifying technology to remove impurities and allergens from the air.

Soap Dispenser with Built-In UV Light: Create a soap dispenser that incorporates a built-in UV light to sanitize the soap and surrounding area. The UV light can help kill bacteria and germs on the soap and sink, providing a cleaner and healthier washing experience.
